title: Undead
description: Here is a disgusting undead ready to rise from the ground and make your hero character freak out! This modular package will let you create a tiny undead army!
longDescription:
Preview: https://sketchfab.com/models/ea1c12552ced4295a8f62037adc741bf

Animations: https://sketchfab.com/models/ea1c12552ced4295a8f62037adc741bf

Customization: https://sketchfab.com/models/ca9a8de65f9c4e45b01aeea99b189239

Here is a disgusting undead ready to rise from the ground and make your hero character freak out!

With this modular package you'll be able to create your own undead army. The package includes: whole body: 9.41Ktris, arms: 3.21 Ktris, feet: 1.06 Ktris, Legs: 724 tris, head: 3.29 Ktris, torso: 1.11 Ktris, braces: 480 tris, Shoulder pad left: 1 Ktris, shoulder pad right: 2.76 Ktris, torso armor: 3.34 Ktris, flanks armor: 1.92 Ktris, pants: 1 Ktris, boots: 1.91 Ktris, helmet: Ktris, horns A: 798 tris, Horns B: 558 tris, horns C: 462 tris, neck armor: 580 tris, collar armor: 1.6 Ktris, eye left and right: 224 tris each, shield: 1.47 Ktris, sword: 473 tris, mace A: 816 tris, mace B: 1.16 Ktris, warhammer: 1.42Ktris, battle axe: 774 tris

The package includes a set of 55 animations (17 being root motion variations)

Intended for PC / MAC and latest Gen consoles
technicalDetails:
Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: No

Animated: Yes

Number of characters: 1

Vertex counts of characters: from 4.7 K to 12.5 K max

Texture Resolutions: up to 4096

Number of Animations: 55

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): Root Motion (17) and In Place (38)

Engine Compatibility: UNREAL ENGINE // 4.15 And Up

Intended Platform: Desktop PC / MAC / XBox1 / PS4

Platforms Tested: PC

Documentation Included: No

Important\Additional Notes: None
